question: Will the floor price of Azuki be 26 ETH or more on May 15?
description:
This is a market on whether Azuki will have a floor price of 26 ETH or more on May 15, 2022 (at 12:00 PM ET), according to https://opensea.io/collection/azuki.

This market will resolve to "Yes" if, on the aforementioned check time, there are no Azukis* listed for sale for less than 26 ETH on the official Azuki collection page on OpenSea. Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No".

*Only listings that have existed for at least an hour are valid for this market. List time for an NFT can be found under “Trading History” by clicking the “Listing” filter and hovering over the date.

Note that the exact price at the check time will be used. If no floor price is available at the check time, the source will be checked every following hour. For valid listings that are declining price auctions, the price exactly at the check time will be used, NOT the price at the initial listing time.

question: Will James Maynard win the 2022 Fields Medal?
description:
The Fields Medal is a prize regarded as the top award in the field of mathematics worldwide. It is awarded to two, three, or four mathematicians under 40 years of age at the International Congress of the International Mathematical Union (IMU), a meeting that takes place every four years. The International Congress of Mathematicians 2022 (ICM 2022) is scheduled to take place as a fully virtual event over 6–14 July 2022.

This market will resolve to "Yes" if James Maynard is awarded the 2022 Fields Medal, and to "No" otherwise.

If the 2022 Fields medalists are not announced by July 21 (11 PM ET), this market will resolve to "No".

The primary resolution source for this market will be official information from the IMU (https://www.mathunion.org/imu-awards/fields-medal), however other credible reporting may be used.

events.title: 2022 NBA Playoffs: May 7th
events.description:
The 2021–22 NBA season is the 76th season of the National Basketball Association (NBA), a professional basketball league in North America. 

The league is composed of 30 teams (29 in the United States and 1 in Canada) and is one of the four major professional sports leagues in the United States and Canada. It is the premier men's professional basketball league in the world.

The playoffs of the 2021-22 NBA season will begin on April 16 and will end at the conclusion of the 2022 NBA Finals. The playoffs follow a tournament format in a best-of-seven series.
